name: Bastion's Revered
flavorText: Used by the leaders of Bastion’s Keep in the war with the Northern Tribes. The Barbarians came to respect the weapon so much that they gave it a name, shortly after tearing it from the hands of a dying garrison commander.
flavorTextHtml: Used by the leaders of Bastion’s Keep in the war with the Northern Tribes. The Barbarians came to respect the weapon so much that they gave it a name, shortly after tearing it from the hands of a dying garrison commander.

secondary.textHtml: Frenzy now stacks up to 10 times and hits an additional time per stack. Each additional hit will chain to any enemies within 15 yards, and the damage is split between all of the affected enemies.
